DOC.brief_summary: The Quality Erection Questionnaire ( QEQ ) new questionnaire develop assess erectile attribute men erectile dysfunction . The study objective validate Quality Erection Questionnaire ( QEQ ) evaluation subject response QEQ regard quality hardness erection baseline compare subject response post 6 10 week dose Viagra ( sildenafil citrate ) .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must document clinical diagnosis erectile dysfunction base screen SHIM score < 21 subject fulfil NIH definition erectile dysfunction Subjects must either PDE5 inhibitor naive ; i.e . never use sildenafil , tadalafil vardenafil , previously treat six dos PDE5 inhibitor ( sildenafil , tadalafil , vardenafil ) must take last dose less 4 week prior screen visit Subjects currently prescribe , take and/or likely treat nitrate nitric oxide donor form either regular intermittent basis
